channel.title: religion on Gabe Kangas
channel.description: Recent content in religion on Gabe Kangas

item.title: Interactions with people and communities, while not having an important common bond.
item.description: It's no secret how much I respect my all of my peers in Omaha. Some of the most talented, most creative, friendliest, amazing people ever. But as I learn more about organizations and people here I do see a thread that is often a strong bond between many of them. And that is the Christian belief community here. There are some really great organizations, from Core Community to inCommon. Smart people in like minded organizations who in a very modern and effective way get together as groups to learn and assist others.
